Posts.Content: I am Canadian We don’t seem to be experiencing the same issue Medical marijuana has been legal a long time and there are dispensaries all over. You can also get it in a viriett of forms. In July this year it became legal for recreational use also with provincial government sales outlets across the country so quality is controlled. I take opioids - hydromorphone - for pain related to rib Mets. I have no problem getting it from my doctor - it has to be signed for when I pick it up at the pharmacy. There are many drugs that are addictive and abused. That doesn’t mean they aren’t useful or even critical when they are needed. It appears that doctors are afraid of the government in the US to the point of the ridiculous.
Posts.Title: New column: "The Little Voice in my Head – Escaping My Biggest Enemy"
